name: PHPBaseClasses
short_description: PHPBaseClasses is a multitier and fully Object Oriented set of base classes written for and in PHP. At this moment the storage tier is SQL only; but it supports multiple databases : Any ODBC database, MsSQL (SyBase), MySQL, PostgreSQL
